lead_paragraph: An Austrian court has found a 14-year-old boy guilty of planning to blow up Vienna’s main railway station after being radicalized by Islamic extremists.

headline.print_headline: Austria: Youth Guilty in Bomb Plot
headline.main: Austria: Youth Guilty in Bomb Plot

snippet: An Austrian court has found a 14-year-old boy guilty of planning to blow up Vienna’s main railway station after being radicalized by Islamic extremists.
